text: Nikola Stanković (; born 18 December 1993) is a Serbian professional footballer who plays as a left back. ==Club career== Born in Sombor, Nikola passed Crvenka youth categories, and also spent six months with Partizan youth team. He made his first senior appearances during the spring half of the 2011–12 season. Stanković played over 70 matches playing for Inđija between 2012 and 2015. For the 2015–16 season, he moved to Bačka Bačka Palanka. After the club promoted in the Serbian SuperLiga, he left at the end of season, and later signed three-year contract with Radnički Niš. ==International career== Stanković made his international debut for the Serbia national football team in a friendly 3-0 loss to Qatar. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;font-size:100%" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=5|Inđija |2011–12 |rowspan=4|First League ||8||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||8||0 |- |2012–13 ||22||0||2||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||24||0 |- |2013–14 ||23||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||24||0 |- |2014–15 ||15||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||15||0 |- !colspan="2"| Total !68!!0!!3!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!71!!0 |- |OFK Bačka |2015–16 |First League ||22||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||23||0 |- |rowspan=4|Radnički Niš |2016–17 |rowspan=3|SuperLiga ||32||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||33||0 |- |2017–18 ||22||1||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||23||1 |- |2018–19 ||8||0||0||0||4||0||colspan="2"|—||12||0 |- !colspan="2"| Total !63!!1!!2!!0!!4!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!69!!1 |- |AEL |2019–20 |Superleague |14||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||15||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !166!!1!!7!!0!!4!!0!!0!!0!!177!!1 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbia international footballers Category:Sportspeople from Sombor Category:Association football defenders Category:FK Inđija players Category:OFK Bačka players Category:FK Radnički Niš players Category:Serbian First League players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players
